title: eLysium eSports LF: Head Coach / Team Re-Branding
body:
Good Afternoon!

eLysium eSports are looking for a dedicated team to aid them in their quest for success. Namely, we need a Head Coach who will give major oversight of the team. Their role will include the selection of players and analysts for the team, giving them almost full autonomy.
 
The founders of eLysium consist of lawyers in their final year of studies, working in the field of traditional sports agency & graduates of marketing/e-commerce. eLysium eSports will be patient with applicants and potential employee's, as we want this done right. There is no end date to our application for Head Coach.

The process concludes when we find the right man or woman for the job. We will consider already established teams re-branding themselves under eLysium eSports.

â€‹http://www.elysiumesports.net/

Please visit the website for more details and to find out how and where to apply!
(Players also welcome to apply for all open roles).

Contact elysiumesportsOCE@gmail.com

replies.body: Hey man Our team is interested plz add me on league and we can discuss more details :)

Please contact us through email. We have been swift with responses thus far.

Kind Regards,

eLysium eSports

Messaged you via email.
I know a team of 5 who's coach/admin staff left them theyre low diamond and could be interested in changing to u.

theres no coach though, but hopefully u consider them

Thank you,

We have a few Head Coach applications coming in and an already experienced team of 5 could really help in the efficacy of putting the team together. Will get back to you in detail shortly!

Regards,

eLysium eSports
